conditions.excellentDesc: Like new, minimal signs of use
conditions.goodDesc: Light signs of use, works perfectly
conditions.usedDesc: Visible signs of use, fully functional
conditions.limitedDesc: More signs of use, budget option

new.label: New
new.description: Brand new and unused product from opened Apple packaging. The product has never been worn or used and is in perfect condition, exactly as you would expect from Apple.

excellent.label: Excellent
excellent.description: Barely distinguishable from new. The product has been minimally used and has no or barely visible marks. Battery health 90% or higher. This is our most popular choice.

good.label: Good
good.description: Light signs of use that are not noticeable during normal use. The AirPod works 100% and has a battery health of at least 80%. Excellent value for money.

used.label: Used
used.description: Clearly visible signs of use such as small scratches or slight discoloration. The product is fully functional with a battery health of at least 70%.

limited.label: Limited
limited.description: The most affordable option. Visible wear and signs of use present. The product functions properly but may have lower battery health. Perfect as a budget choice.
